Away, away, the morning freshly breaking
Auber, D. F. E. (Daniel François Esprit), 1782-1871. Muette de Portici. Amis, le soleil va paraître. English

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Title page illustration: Figures on a beach, three standing near the water's edge with upraised arms, and two in small boats.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Library's copy imperfect; lacking all after p. 6.
